author: Nicole Blackmore
title: Budget 2015: Millions to be hit by insurance price rises
text: Budget 2015: Millions to be hit by insurance price rises In a surprise move the Chancellor increased the tax on general insurance premiums by more than 50pc Fabienne d'Adhemar with her two children Luca and Clementine. Photo: Julian Andrews
